targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(created)
FROM users

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(0,$__interval),
  count(id) AS "id"
FROM trees_adopted
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  count(distinct(id))
FROM trees

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(0,$__interval),
  count(distinct(tree_id)) AS "id"
FROM trees_adopted
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("timestamp",$__interval),
  sum(CAST (amount AS INTEGER)) AS "Liter (Summe)"
FROM trees_watered
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(created,$__interval,NULL),
  count(uuid)
FROM users
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  count(created)
FROM users
where $__timeFilter(created)

SELECT
  count(*)
FROM users
where created <= $__timeTo()

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(0,$__interval),
  count(timestamp) AS "id"
FROM trees_watered
where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(0,$__interval),
  count(distinct(uuid)) AS "id"
FROM trees_watered
where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(0,$__interval),
  count(distinct(tree_id)) AS "id"
FROM trees_watered
where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(0,$__interval),
  sum(CAST (amount AS INTEGER)) AS "liter"
FROM trees_watered
where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  count(created)
FROM users
where created >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000'

SELECT
  count(*)
FROM users

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(0,$__interval),
  count(timestamp) AS "id"
FROM trees_watered
where timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(0,$__interval),
  count(distinct(uuid)) AS "id"
FROM trees_watered
where timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(0,$__interval),
  count(distinct(tree_id)) AS "id"
FROM trees_watered
where timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(0,$__interval),
  sum(CAST (amount AS INTEGER)) AS "liter"
FROM trees_watered
where timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

select row_number() over(order by sum(CAST (tw.amount AS INTEGER)) desc) Rang, t.bezirk AS Ortsteil, sum(CAST (tw.amount AS INTEGER)) as gegossen from trees_watered tw join trees t on tw.tree_id = t.id where $__timeFilter(tw.timestamp) group by tw.uuid, t.bezirk order by gegossen desc

select row_number() over(order by count(distinct(tw.tree_id)) desc) AS Rang, bezirk AS Ortsteil, count(distinct(tw.tree_id)) as baum_anzahl from trees_watered tw join trees t on tw.tree_id = t.id where $__timeFilter(tw.timestamp) group by t.bezirk having count(distinct(tw.tree_id)) > 1 order by baum_anzahl desc

panels.title: Bäume nach Ortsteile, die mehr als einmal gegossen worden sind

targets.rawSql: select row_number() over(order by count(*) desc) AS rang, t.bezirk as Ortsteil, count(*) as giess_anzahl from trees_watered tw join trees t on tw.tree_id = t.id where $__timeFilter(tw.timestamp) group by t.bezirk having count(*) > 1 order by giess_anzahl desc, t.bezirk

select row_number() over(order by sum(CAST (tw.amount AS INTEGER)) desc) Rang, t.bezirk AS Ortsteil, sum(CAST (tw.amount AS INTEGER)) as gegossen from trees_watered tw join trees t on tw.tree_id = t.id  where tw.timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000' group by tw.uuid, t.bezirk order by gegossen desc

select row_number() over(order by count(distinct(tw.tree_id)) desc) AS Rang, bezirk AS Ortsteil, count(distinct(tw.tree_id)) as baum_anzahl from trees_watered tw join trees t on tw.tree_id = t.id where tw.timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000' group by t.bezirk having count(distinct(tw.tree_id)) > 1 order by baum_anzahl desc

panels.title: Bäume nach Ortsteile, die mehr als einmal gegossen worden sind

targets.rawSql: select row_number() over(order by count(*) desc) AS rang, t.bezirk as Ortsteil, count(*) as giess_anzahl from trees_watered tw join trees t on tw.tree_id = t.id where tw.timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000' group by t.bezirk having count(*) > 1 order by giess_anzahl desc, t.bezirk

SELECT
  t.id as tree,
  tw.amount::numeric::integer as value,
  t.lat::numeric::float as latitude,
  t.lng::numeric::float as longitude
FROM trees_watered tw JOIN trees t ON tw.tree_id = t.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)

SELECT 
  date_part('year', timestamp::date) as year,
  date_trunc('week', timestamp::date) AS weekly, 
  tree_id,
  SUM(amount::int)
FROM
  trees_watered
WHERE
  timestamp >= '2022-01-01T00:00:00.000Z'
GROUP BY year, weekly, tree_id
ORDER BY year, weekly, tree_id

SELECT tw.tree_id
FROM
  trees_watered tw
LEFT OUTER JOIN 
  trees t
ON t.id = tw.tree_id
WHERE
  t.id IS null
ORDER by tw.tree_id

SELECT
  tree_id,
  sum(amount::INTEGER) AS "litersumme"
FROM trees_watered
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp")
GROUP BY tree_id
ORDER BY litersumme

panels.title: Summe Gegossene Liter je Baum nach Zeitraum

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date AS "time",
  mm
FROM station_values
WHERE
  station_id = 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  date_trunc('week', date) AS weekly,
  SUM(mm) as mm
FROM station_values
WHERE
  station_id = 1
GROUP BY weekly  
ORDER BY weekly

SELECT
  date_trunc('week', date) AS weekly,
  SUM(mm*$m2) as mm
FROM station_values
WHERE
  station_id = 1
GROUP BY weekly  
ORDER BY weekly

panels.title: Niederschlag Leipzig/Holzhausen wöchentliche Summe liter/$m2 m² (Baumscheibe)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  v.mm as niederschlag,
  g.gegossen as gegossen,
  v.weekly_rain as time
FROM (
SELECT
  date_trunc('week', s.date) AS weekly_rain,
  SUM(s.mm*$m2) as mm
FROM station_values AS s
WHERE
  s.station_id = 1
GROUP BY weekly_rain  
) AS v
 LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  date_trunc('week', w.timestamp) AS weekly_watered,
  SUM(CAST (w.amount AS integer)) as gegossen
FROM trees_watered AS w JOIN trees t ON t.id = w.tree_id
WHERE t.standortnr = '$standort_nummer'
GROUP BY weekly_watered
) AS g ON (g.weekly_watered = v.weekly_rain)
WHERE $__timeFilter(v.weekly_rain)

panels.title: wöchentlicher  Niederschlag (pro $m2 m²)  + gegossene Liter für den Baum mit der Standortnummer $standort_nummer

targets.rawSql:
SELECT t.id, t.standortnr as Standortnummer, count(*) AS AnzahlWochen 
FROM (
  SELECT
    g.tree_id as tree_id,
    v.weekly_rain as weekly,
    SUM(COALESCE(v.mm,0) + COALESCE(g.gegossen,0)) AS summe
  FROM (
    SELECT
      date_trunc('week', s.date) AS weekly_rain,
      SUM(s.mm*$m2) as mm
    FROM station_values AS s
    WHERE
      s.station_id = 1
    AND $__timeFilter(s.date)
    GROUP BY weekly_rain  
  ) AS v 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN (
    SELECT
      t.id as tree_id,
      date_trunc('week', w.timestamp) AS weekly_watered,
      SUM(CAST (w.amount AS integer)) as gegossen
    FROM trees AS t LEFT OUTER JOIN trees_watered AS w ON t.id = w.tree_id
    WHERE $__timeFilter(w.timestamp)
    GROUP BY t.id, weekly_watered
  ) AS g
  ON (g.weekly_watered = v.weekly_rain)
  GROUP BY g.tree_id, v.weekly_rain
  HAVING SUM(COALESCE(v.mm,0) + COALESCE(g.gegossen,0)) >= $required_liters
) AS a JOIN trees t ON t.id = a.tree_id
GROUP BY t.id, t.standortnr
ORDER BY count(*) DESC

panels.title: Bäume mit Anzahl Wochen, in denen >= $required_liters Liter (Regen ($m2 m²) + gegossen)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT t.id, t.standortnr as Standortnummer, count(*) AS AnzahlWochen 
FROM (
  SELECT
    g.tree_id as tree_id,
    v.weekly_rain as weekly,
    SUM(COALESCE(v.mm,0)) AS summe
  FROM (
    SELECT
      date_trunc('week', s.date) AS weekly_rain,
      SUM(s.mm*$m2) as mm
    FROM station_values AS s
    WHERE
      s.station_id = 1
    AND $__timeFilter(s.date)
    GROUP BY weekly_rain  
  ) AS v 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN (
    SELECT
      t.id as tree_id,
      date_trunc('week', w.timestamp) AS weekly_watered,
      SUM(CAST (w.amount AS integer)) as gegossen
    FROM trees AS t LEFT OUTER JOIN trees_watered AS w ON t.id = w.tree_id
    WHERE $__timeFilter(w.timestamp)
    GROUP BY t.id, weekly_watered
  ) AS g
  ON (g.weekly_watered = v.weekly_rain)
  GROUP BY g.tree_id, v.weekly_rain
  HAVING SUM(COALESCE(v.mm,0)) >= $required_liters
) AS a JOIN trees t ON t.id = a.tree_id
GROUP BY t.id, t.standortnr
ORDER BY count(*) DESC

panels.title: Bäume mit Anzahl Wochen, in denen >= $required_liters Liter (nur Regen ($m2 m²))

targets.rawSql:
SELECT t.id, t.standortnr as Standortnummer, count(*) AS AnzahlWochen 
FROM (
  SELECT
    g.tree_id as tree_id,
    v.weekly_rain as weekly,
    SUM(COALESCE(v.mm,0) + COALESCE(g.gegossen,0)) AS summe
  FROM (
    SELECT
      date_trunc('week', s.date) AS weekly_rain,
      SUM(s.mm*$m2) as mm
    FROM station_values AS s
    WHERE
      s.station_id = 1
    AND $__timeFilter(s.date)
    GROUP BY weekly_rain  
  ) AS v 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN (
    SELECT
      t.id as tree_id,
      date_trunc('week', w.timestamp) AS weekly_watered,
      SUM(CAST (w.amount AS integer)) as gegossen
    FROM trees AS t LEFT OUTER JOIN trees_watered AS w ON t.id = w.tree_id
    WHERE $__timeFilter(w.timestamp)
    GROUP BY t.id, weekly_watered
  ) AS g
  ON (g.weekly_watered = v.weekly_rain)
  GROUP BY g.tree_id, v.weekly_rain
  HAVING SUM(COALESCE(v.mm,0)) < $required_liters AND SUM(COALESCE(v.mm,0) + COALESCE(g.gegossen,0)) >= $required_liters
) AS a JOIN trees t ON t.id = a.tree_id
GROUP BY t.id, t.standortnr
ORDER BY count(*) DESC

panels.title: Bäume mit Anzahl Wochen, in denen nur mit Gießen >= $required_liters Liter

targets.rawSql:
SELECT x.weekly_rain, x.mm
FROM (
SELECT
  date_trunc('week', s.date) AS weekly_rain,
  SUM(s.mm*$m2) as mm
FROM station_values AS s
WHERE
  s.station_id = 1
GROUP BY weekly_rain
) AS x
WHERE x.mm >= $required_liters
AND $__timeFilter(weekly_rain)
ORDER BY weekly_rain ASC

panels.title: Wochen, in denen >= $required_liters Liter Regen ($m2 m²)
